column5: Hello there,  Girlfriend and myself booked a cabin on buckhorn at scotsman point for our graduation trip.  I've fished the kwarthas a few times this season, but I'm not too familiar with buckhorn.  I want to show her a good time and catch some decent sized fish.  Anyone got any tips for this lake as in decent spots or what type of gear to use.  Any help would be appreciated.  Cheers.
